page.title: 13NORTH FARMS NORTH LANE
page.content: BRAILSFORD. Part of the James Player Estate. The farmhouse garden & 1 acre field are rented to Mr Peter King, an industrial chemist. After working for a big concern he set up his own busi- ness & runs it from home - Country Garden Products - this is housed in the outbuildings. The ingredients are bought in for the making of talc soap,pot-pourri, creams, which are then made up by 4 full time workers & outworkers living locally.Some mix- ing of dried flowers is done on the premises. Goods sold direct to retail trade & also exported to America, Sth Africa & Italy. Jersey cow provides milk & a pig is reared for family use. Vegetables are grown for home use. 4 dogs on the premises. 4 children are members of the Pony Club & Young Farm- ers Club - in term time they are at boarding school or college.
